definition: to fart/to break wind/to talk nonsense/Utter rubbish!
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
fart/flatulence/nonsense/(usu. in the negative) what/(not) a damn thing
lit. to take off trousers to fart/fig. to do something absolutely unnecessary/fig. to make things too complicated

sentences.english: He said the more he ate, the more he farted.
Felian: What’s meaning of “hold the wall when farting”?
The more he ate, the more he farted.
sentences.chinese: 他喫的愈多，放屁也愈多。

sentences.english: Never fart, burp, or cuss in public.
sentences.chinese: 永遠不要在公共場所放屁，打嗝或者罵人。

sentences.english: Gather all your friends and laugh to tears when the poor guy starts farting.
sentences.chinese: 召集你的朋友一起嘲笑那個被整的放屁朋友。

sentences.english: Do not get too flustered about farting, however.
sentences.chinese: 不過，可別對放屁過於緊張。

sentences.english: Felian: Don't mention three days.I will see stars just for skipping one regular meal and I will hold the wall when farting!
sentences.chinese: 別說三天了，我一頓不喫就眼冒金星，放屁扶着牆了。

sentences.english: Aren’t you afraid that you will hold the wall when farting?
A fox breaks wind in order to escape from hunting dogs.
Andrew: She farts in her sleep.
I just can't stop farting all the time.
sentences.chinese: 我只是不能控制地一直放屁。

sentences.english: 'He don't even fart, ' added the tailor, gloomily.
sentences.chinese: “他也從來不放屁，”裁縫陰鬱地說道。

sentences.english: What's meaning of “hold the wall when farting”?
sentences.chinese: 你知道什麼是放屁扶着牆嗎？

sentences.english: Underpants and farting have been in plentiful supply for the last few years.
sentences.chinese: 內褲及放屁這樣的例子已經使用好多年了。

definition: fart/flatulence/nonsense/(usu. in the negative) what/(not) a damn thing
to pass water/to piss/to urinate/to wee wee
see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
